translation: I do nothing at all," thus would the harmonized knower of Truth think, seeing, hearing, touching, smelling, eating, going, sleeping, and breathing.
commentary: 5.8 Not not? Eve even? A little anything? I do I do? It is thus? right centered (in the Self)? Maybe should think? Tattvavit the knower of Truth? seeing seeing? hearing hearing? touching touching? Jighran smelling? Ashnan eating? going going? Swapan sleeping? breathing breathing.No Commentary.
